page.title: 15Mr Gorden Lorenz
page.content: Gorden Lorenz is an well known local showbusiness personality. Somtimes he appears on television. He writes songs, makes video films and opens shows. He is a strong believer in the {Christain}faith and is a member of{The {Salvation Army.}Somtimes he makes video films for them. He writes songs because he likes music and has once got into the top ten charts with a song called,{'Grandma'.}It only takes him a day to write a song but about two weeks to record it. His favourite five songs are: 'Grandma', 'He's My Dad', 'Have You Read the Story?', 'My Mum's One in a Million' and 'Hornpipe'. The Lorenz family used to live in Liverpool then they moved to Holloway in Derbyshire. Mr. Lorenz has sold two million records in twenty countries.
